channel.title: theBalancedBriefNLbreakingNews
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from theBalancedBriefNLbreakingNews, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Air India crash probe focuses on actions of plane's captain, Wall Street Journal reports
Army veteran and US citizen arrested in California immigration raid warns it could happen to anyone
Melania Trump’s 4-Word Response to Reportedly Marrying Donald for Money Resurfaces

Trump says Coca-Cola will use real sugar in its US flagship drink. The company isn't confirming that
Survivors' lawyers say Illinois has one of nation's worst records on sex abuse in juvenile detention
item.description: Illinois has one of the nation’s worst problems with child sex abuse at juvenile detention centers

item.title: Puppies rescued from flood-stricken Texas arrive at Chicago shelter
item.description: Dogs and puppies from parts of Texas submerged by the catastrophic flooding that killed at least 132 people have arrived at the no-kill shelter PAWS C...

item.title: Federal court says Arkansas can enforce ban on critical race theory in classrooms
item.description: A federal appeals court has ruled that Arkansas can enforce its ban on critical race theory in classrooms

item.title: First the shoes went back on. Now, at US airport security, more liquid in carry-ons may be at hand
item.description: Homeland Security Secretary Kristi Noem suggests changes to the amount of liquids travelers can carry on planes may be coming
